mapper.select: select pmb.* ,dept.dept_name,dept.dept_no ,sc.staff_no,sc.staff_name, pmbs.join_datetime,pmbs.change_time,pmbs.amount,pmbs.description from personnel_monthly_base pmb inner join personnel_monthly_bonus pmbs on pmb.id = pmbs.id inner join tb_other_staff sc on pmb.staff_id = sc.staff_id left JOIN ts_dept dept on pmb.dept_id = dept.dept_id where pmb.id = #{id}
